results.title: Mckenna's mind matters: control stress (S)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Paul McKenna’s easy way to health & fitness”.
WARNING: THIS VIDEO SHOULD BE KEPT OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN AND PERSONS UNDER 18 YEARS OF AGE. THIS VIDEO SHOULD NOT BE WATCHED BY ANY PERSON WHO SUFFERS, OR MAY SUFFER FROM EPILEPSY, CLINICAL DEPRESSION, OR ANY OTHER NERVOUS OR PSYCHIATRIC CONDITION The Epilepsy Foundation of Victoria advises that this program contains outdated information, terminology and practices. The video “Control stress” will calm you down and preserve energy in order to reach goals. Using the latest techniques of personal enhancement, and hypnotic powers of trance to build up inner strength and peace.

results.title: Matt Mann's swimming techniques for girls
results.brief_description: A demonstration of Matt Mann’s teaching principles applied to a group of girls. The crawl, breast stroke, back stroke, and butterfly stroke are demonstrated in both regular and slow motion photography.

results.title: Mathematics of the honeycomb
results.creator_credit: Moody Institute of Science. Educational Film Division
results.brief_description: Explains the place of mathematics in engineering and the sciences as evidenced by the application of modern mathematical methods to the honeycomb problem. Includes close-up scenes of bees exuding and manipulating wax.

results.title: Maternal deprivation in young children
results.creator_credit: Genevieve Appell, Institut National d'Hygiene and New York University. Film Library
results.brief_description: Part of the record collected by a French research unit studying the effects of mernal deprivation in young children. Those studied are between one and two-and-a-half years old. All had been reared in institutions where because of impersonal care they had become seriously impaired in the capacity for human relationship. The film shows the disorders that appear and the subsequent progress of the children under psychotherapy. A study carried out by a French research unit directed by Jenny Rondinesco.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Genevieve Appell, Institut National d’Hygiene and New York University. Film Library

results.title: Production control. Part II
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Industrial Management”.
The three final steps in production control scheduling, despatching, and follow up demonstrates the use of the master schedule and of the shop schedule, and how despatching in both centralised and de-centralised forms.

results.title: Quality control
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Industrial Management”.
Industry controls the quality of its product by keeping a check on the variable factors in manufacturing; men, machines, materials, manufacturing conditions, etc. This film describes factors in setting quality standards on manufacturing cost and selling price.

results.title: Internal organization
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Industrial Management”.
Illustrates the fundamental purposes of business organization and basic organizational procedures, such as delegation of authority, division of labour and assignment of responsibility. Shows the types of organization that can be adapted to the needs of any enterprise.

results.title: Risk and forecasting
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Industrial Management”.
